name: Comms
description: Communication integrations for Twilio (SMS), SendGrid (email), and Stripe (billing).

prd.problemStatement: The system needs to send SMS messages to crew, emails for notifications, and process payments. Integrated communication services enable these capabilities.
userStories: As a system, I want to send SMS so that crew receives timely updates
As a system, I want to send emails so that users receive notifications
